kubejs.ponder.tag.toms_storage.descripti: Blocks and items use to make a storage system
kubejs.ponder.crafting_terminal.header: How to set up a storage system
kubejs.ponder.crafting_terminal.text_1: The Inventory Connector is the heart of the storage system. You can only have 1 in every network
kubejs.ponder.crafting_terminal.text_2: It can connect to any nearby inventorys and access stored items
kubejs.ponder.crafting_terminal.text_3: It also connects through other storages touching to the connector up to 16 blocks away
kubejs.ponder.crafting_terminal.text_4: The cable connector allows you to access the combined storage of your system.
kubejs.ponder.crafting_terminal.text_5: The crafting terminal is the way players read the storage system and craft items
kubejs.ponder.crafting_terminal.text_6: It has to be placed on an inventory connector, or cable connector to work.
